snippet: Major airlines are investing in things like better seats, while Spirit is making a profit and expanding with low fares but many fees.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes major airlines are investing in things to improve the coach business traveler's experience, like better seats; notes Spirit Airlines is making a profit and expanding with low fares but many fees.
lead_paragraph: Major airlines are investing in things like better seats, while Spirit is making a profit and expanding with low fares but many fees.

headline.print_headline: In a Changing Market, Low Prices vs. More Comfort
headline.main: In a Changing Market, Low Prices vs. More Comfort
